features: Suave Soothing with Aloe Body Lotion is a body lotion with aloe vera that provides 24 hour moisturization
Our cream with aloe vera is dermatologist tested
Also try Suave body wash, hair, and deodorant products
body.description: Product Description Indulge in Suave Revitalizing Body Lotion with Vitamin E that provides 60% more moisture to make your skin look noticeably healthier and beautifully radiant. This unique formula with a combination of the anti-oxidants vitamin E and A, along with Pro-vitamin B-5, restores moisture to parched skin. The rich emollient base helps make dullness disappear and helps restore the soft, smooth feel of your skin. The formula absorbs quickly and easily, leaving skin feeling smooth and soothed. The Skin Solutions formulas are clinically proven to moisturize as well as more premium skincare variants so that you can have beautiful looking skin every single day. Suave Revitalizing Body Lotion with Vitamin E is Clinically Proven to moisturize as well as Philosophy Amazing Grace Firming Body Emulsion. For best results, smooth lotion on hands and body every day. Try all Suave Professionals Body Lotions. Choose a variety of flavors within the range. Suave Skin Solutions range is available in a number of sizes to fit your exact needs. This item goes well with other Suave products: try Suave body wash, Suave haircare, and Suave deodorant products. There is a Suave for every skin need. Enjoy beautiful skin everyday with Suave. From the Manufacturer Suave Skin Therapy Aloe with Cucumber Moisturizer, this light moisturizer with natural aloe and soothing cucumber is perfect for soothing after-sun dry skin or for anytime moisturization. Never greasy formula absorbs quickly and easily into skin. Rich emollients penetrate deeply to restore skin's vital natural moisture.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Soothing lotion is a hydrating formula infused with Aloe and Cucumber Extracts that soothes and refreshes dry skin. Suave brand – Listed as animal test–free by PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program, 2022

Cruelty-Free Globally, Suave does not test on animals and is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA. Suave brand – Listed as animal test–free by PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program, 2022 Unbelievably Soft And Smooth Skin The formula of our Suave Body Lotions leaves skin looking and feeling unbelievably soft and smooth. Suave Skin Solutions Enjoy all-day moisture with our range of lotions in your favorite scents for every skin need. Suave. Beauty With Benefits Whatever you and your families' haircare, skin or hygiene needs, you can have complete confidence that Suave products will help you boost your mind, body and spirit.

Suave Skin Solutions Rose And Argan Oil Extract Smoothing Lotion Suave Skin Solutions Calming Lotion Lavender Suave Skin Solutions 100% Natural Almond Oil And Shea Butter Lotion Main Benefit Our Smoothing lotion is infused with Rose and Argan Oil Extract. Enriched with a unique blend of nutrients, which are known to enhance the moisturization of the layers of skin and improve texture. Our Lavender Calming lotion is made with calming Lavender and Vanilla Extracts. It easily glides onto your skin and absorbs quickly leaving your skin feeling soft and smooth, with a gentle calming fragrance. This body lotion is infused with 100% natural Almond and Shea Butter extracts, which are known for their rich conditioning properties.
Suave brand – Listed as animal test–free by PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program, 2022

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this lotion
reviews.reviewText: love the scent, its not heavy or greasy and it stays on for a decent amount of time. This is definitely my go to lotion when camping , keeps my skin hydrated while outdoors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best value out there
reviews.reviewText: This is the best value lotion out there. Moisturizes and is very flat/water-based so your hands don’t feel oily afterwards. It’s also so much cheaper than every other lotion on the market luxury product for a non luxury price. You’d never know though because no one makes tik toks about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars works fine and it has soft scent
reviews.reviewText: I used it daily because of my aging dried skin so far it works fine its not greasy to my skin and it has a soft smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with my purchase. Doesn't work all that well on my extremely dry skin, but oh well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, cheaper than the big box stores
reviews.reviewText: Just what I've always used at a cheaper price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sent some to the Caribbean and kept the rest. Good deal but not the best moisturizer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Originally, I had bought these all for my mom because of her sensitive skin there aren't too many lotions she can use. I'm already on my second bottle. This stuff is great! I've used dozens and dozens of different lotions but this one has a nice soft smell, it's affordable and it feels nice. Just don't use it if you have an eczema flair up and your skin cracks, it doesn't feel good then lol
